name: Hands-on: Hello Organized World
body:
### Requisitos

* Git
* JDK 1.7.x

### Execução

Assista o vídeo feito para o projeto Hello Java World em [http://youtu.be/wa2zjLtc13A](http://youtu.be/wa2zjLtc13A)

Compilando os fontes

	rm -fR bin

	rm -fR dist

	mkdir bin

	mkdir bin/classes

	shopt -s globstar

	javac -cp libs/commons-cli-1.2.jar -d bin/classes **/*.java


Empacotando a aplicação

	jar -cfm bin/app.jar ./src/resources/manifest.txt -C bin/classes .

	jar -tf bin/app.jar
		META-INF/
		    MANIFEST.MF
		how/
		    Greetings.class
		    App.class
		    service/
		        GreetingsService.class
	
	mkdir dist

	mkdir dist/bin

	cp -R bin/app.jar dist/bin 

	cp -R libs dist 


Executando a aplicação

	cd dist

	java -jar bin/app.jar [options] <visitor-name>

Ex.: 

	cd dist

	java -jar bin/app.jar -fv Fulano
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
